definition[0]: (1927-2011) a US actor from New York City who was best known for playing Lieutenant Colombo in the television series Colombo. Colombo was a detective who wore an old raincoat and smoked a cigar. He was well-known for saying “Just one more thing” when putting questions to the person who he thought had committed a crime. He also appeared in several films in including It’s a Mad Mad World (1963).
